course_title: Studies in a Major Figure: Maria Irenes Fornés
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 9 / Seats Avail: 2Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
(Same as WGS 385 4, ENG 389 2)
This section of Studies in a Major Figure will focus on Maria Irene Fornés, Cuban-American playwright, theater director, master teacher, and one of the most influential dramatists in American Theater history.
course_description: A consideration of the work of a major theatrical figure (dramatist, director, designer).
sections: Class Nbr: 3885, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: K. Belflower, Status: Open
